√cam 'sip'

present: [1.] cā́mati B.+  camanti etc.   -- [5.] camnoti  

perfect: cacāma  cemus  

[aorist: acāmi  acamīt  camiṣyati  camitā  ]

verbal: cāṃta S.+  -cámya B.+  

secondary: intensive: cañcam-   -- desiderative: cicamiṣa-   -- causative: cāmayati etc. B.+  -camayya  

derivatives: camaka? (n.)  -cāma S.+  camana S.+  camasá V.+  camū́? V.+  -cāṃti C.
